text.0: here is your ghostly kinship here o men they came desirous to these holy rites with store of wealth.
text.1: with wondrous arts whereby with schemes to meet each need ye gained sudhanvans sons your share in sacrifice.
text.2: the mighty powers wherewith ye formed the chalices the thought by which ye drew the cow from out the hide.
text.3: the intellect wherewith ye wrought the two bay steedsthrough these o Ṛbhus ye attained divinity.
text.4: friendship with indra have the Ṛbhus fully gained grandsons of manu they skilfully urged the work.
text.5: sudhanvans children won them everlasting life serving with holy rites pious with noble acts.
text.6: in company with indra come ye to the juice then gloriously shall your wishes be fulfilled.
text.7: not to be paragoned ye priests are your good deeds nor your heroic acts Ṛbhus sudhanvans sons.
text.8: o indra with the Ṛbhus mighty ones pour down the soma juice effused wellblent from both thy hands.
text.9: maghalan urged by song in the drinkofferers house rejoice thee with the heroes with sudhanvans sons.
text.10: with Ṛbhu near and vāja indra here exult with saci praised of many in the juice we pour.
text.11: these homes wherein we dwell have turned themselves to thee devotions to the gods as laws of men ordain.
text.12: come with the mighty Ṛbhus indra come to us strengthening with thy help the singers holy praise.
text.13: at hundred eager calls come to the living man with thousand arts attend the act of sacrifice.
